game.name: TitTok Kitty
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: TitTok Kitty - cute and kind puzzles with Cats. 50 unique puzzles! The goal of the player is to build pictures consisting of different elements. Three puzzle formats and three difficulty levels: Easy, Normal, Difficult! TikTok ≠ TitTok
game.shortDescriptionEn: TitTok Kitty - cute and kind puzzles with Cats. 50 unique puzzles! The goal of the player is to build pictures consisting of different elements. Three puzzle formats and three difficulty levels: Easy, Normal, Difficult! TikTok ≠ TitTok

reviewHighlights.text: despite its name, you puzzle cats together, dont get the dlc tho, from what ive heard its just ai p*rn
TitTok Kitty is a small, cozy puzzle game that wears its intentions openly: it wants to be cute, calm, and comfortably simple. Developed and published...
